name: Cloud Chasers
summary: Guide a trailblazing father and daughter team through the deadly deserts of a dystopian future. Experience multiple narrative encounters with the weird, wicked and wondrous inhabitants of the five deserts. Fly high through the clouds with your trusty glider and collect the water you will need to survive. Reach the safe haven above the clouds by strategically managing your inventory and resources.
storyline:
LOOKING FOR AN ACTION-ADVENTURE WITH AN EPIC STORY AND UNIQUE GAMEPLAY?

Guide a trailblazing father and daughter team through the deadly deserts of a dystopian future.

Experience multiple narrative encounters with the weird, wicked and wondrous inhabitants of the five deserts.

Fly high through the clouds with your trusty glider and collect the water you will need to survive.

Reach the safe haven above the clouds by strategically managing your inventory and resources.
